item.title: TALIA and the SUPAGETTI
item.description: Talia and the Supagetti My Natalia, She lay on the other side of the bed, breathing , softly. Her chest rising ,almost not. She looked not evil. She filled my brain with pictures of birds, green and red. Images of blue flowers swinging by their stalks on vines; multi-colored snakes wrapped in the vines. Looking at her made me itch for my brushes. I wanted to paint on her skin.
